name: Data Classification and Handling Rules
description: Classification tiers with handling requirements and disjointness

theory.natural_language: Data is classified as Public, Internal, or Restricted. Restricted data must be encrypted and cannot be emailed externally. Internal data can be emailed internally but not posted publicly. Public data has no restrictions. File A is Restricted. File B is Internal. File C is Public.

queries.natural_language: May File A be emailed to an external partner?

expected_answer.natural_language: No. Restricted data cannot be emailed externally and must be encrypted.
expected_answer.explanation: FileA IS_A Restricted ∧ Restricted PROHIBITS external_email

queries.natural_language: Can File B be sent in an internal email?

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. Internal data may be emailed internally.
expected_answer.explanation: FileB IS_A Internal ∧ Internal PERMITS internal_email

expected_answer.natural_language: No. Public data has no restrictions.
expected_answer.explanation: FileC IS_A Public ∧ Public HAS_NO restriction
